pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Extreme Value Analysis with the Hierarchical Model of Reich and Shaby (2012) // Several procedures for the hierarchical kernel extreme value process of Reich and Shaby (2012) DOI:10.1214/12-AOAS591, including simulation, estimation and spatial extrapolation. The spatial latent variable model DOI:10.1214/11-STS376 is also included.
